com.plexobject.deploy

Class AutoDeployer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plexobject.deploy.AutoDeployer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceRegistryLifecycleAware

    public class AutoDeployer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceRegistryLifecycleAware
    This is a helper class that searches service classes that define ServiceConfig annotations and automatically deploys them.
